StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateMediaInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MediaInfoID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int, @MediaTypeID smallint, @MediaName varchar(100), @PointOfContactID uniqueiden..er, @Organiza.onID int, @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er
Select @CollegePro.leID = CollegePro.leID FROM CollegePro.le cp where School_Code = @SchoolCode and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].MediaInfo WHERE MediaInfoID= @MediaInfoID)
BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[MediaInfo]
SET [TypeID]= @MediaTypeID, [Descripton]= @MediaName, [CollegePro.leID] = @CollegePro.leID, [PointOfContactID]= @PointOfContactID, --[Organiza.onID] = @Organiza.onID, [UserLogin]= @UserLogin, [UpdateDate]= GetDate()
WHERE MediaInfoID= @MediaInfoID END ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[MediaInfo] ([MediaInfoID] ,[TypeID],[Name],[Descripton], [CollegePro.leID], [PointOfContactID], [Organiza.onID], [UserLogin],[UpdateDate] ) VALUES (@MediaInfoID, @MediaTypeID,'', @MediaName, @CollegePro.leID, @PointOfContactID, Null, @UserLogin, GetDate())
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
